Package Game.Core

The core functionality of the game.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameStateInterface
    GameStateInterface is an interface for representing the state of a game of UNO.
    RulesInterface
    Interface that defines structure of the rulebook.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGame
    AbstractGame defines the methods to be implemented in a Game for the server implementation to work.
    GameState
    GameState holds the current state of the game, the game and the cards being played will alter the state of the game.
    Rules
    Rules is the class where the game rules are defined, this includes what cards are allowed, if a player can say uno, if a player should be penalized, when a player have won etc.
    UnoGame
    UnoGame implements the logic to playing Uno, by using the Rules class and the GameState class a game of Uno Can be played.

Package Game.Core Description

The core functionality of the game.
